language_considerations.overview: Malaysia is multilingual with distinct platform-language patterns for Korean beauty content

platform_language_mapping.facebook: Malay (primary), English, Chinese -- mass market reach across all ethnicities
platform_language_mapping.instagram: English (dominant), Malay -- urban, educated, aspirational content
platform_language_mapping.tiktok: Malay, English mixed -- short-form content crosses language barriers visually
platform_language_mapping.youtube: English, Malay -- long-form reviews, tutorials, vlogs
platform_language_mapping.xiaohongshu: Mandarin Chinese -- exclusively Chinese Malaysian community, 2.5M users
platform_language_mapping.twitter_x: English (dominant) -- smaller user base, tech-savvy demographic
platform_language_mapping.google_search: English (primary), Malay, Chinese -- SEO strategy must cover all three

content_strategy.mass_market: Bahasa Malaysia achieves lower costs and higher engagement for mass-market products
content_strategy.premium_positioning: English performs better for professional services and premium offerings
content_strategy.chinese_niche: Mandarin on Xiaohongshu captures high-spending Chinese Malaysian demographic
content_strategy.visual_first: Visual content (before/after, short video) transcends language barriers across all groups
